channel.title: [508] Invalid username and pass 2nd login? [508]
channel.description:
First time I login it works perfectly no errors but when I log out and try to log back in on the same account, same password, same everything it tells me invalid username or password?
keep in mind this is a 508.. not 317.

item.title: [508] Invalid username and pass 2nd login? [508]
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:11, topic:275856”][quote author=sexy slay link=topic=364384.msg2766032#msg2766032 date=1240796192]
some times sources are coded inproperly, so i recommend trying a different source.
[/quote]

I want to rage at you, but I wont.[/quote]

Thus deeming your post pointless.

@Topic, Pali’s base has issues with player saving and loading.
If you’re not sure how to fix it, look at other sources and see how they have it and compare.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Invalid username and pass 2nd login? [508]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:9, topic:275856”]I’m 100% sure this is a server issue.
If you can’t figure out what’s wrong by making sure it’s loading and saving your password correctly, I’m afraid you’ll probably have to download a new server.[/quote]

Tried that
I think Ill just go back to 317-477…

item.title: [508] Invalid username and pass 2nd login? [508]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:7, topic:275856”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=364384.msg2766826#msg2766826 date=1240864553]

some times sources are coded inproperly, so i recommend trying a different source.

Yeah, if something is improperly programmed don’t attempt to fix it, just give up.
[/quote]

True (Sarcasm) ^

Also guys, just because Pali programmed it doesn’t make it perfect. Everything has errors.[/quote]

Yeah I think pali is pretty gay, with all the battlescape never being up at all.

but anyways,
Didn’t most or all other sources start from palis?

EDIT: I WILL TRY DLING ANOTHER SOURCE!
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 27, 2009, 02:59:14 pm[/size][hr]Actually I think its my client, gonna try dling the client again.

EDIT 2:
TRIED DLING THE CLIENT AGAIN, DIDNT WORK!!!
